Legal Representation For Fraudulent Or Negligent Mismanagement Of Investments

Trying to understand every aspect of your financial situation can be difficult. From annuities and retirement plans to stocks and bonds, you put your trust in a financial planner to help you make sound decisions — but that doesn’t always happen.

Signs Of Possible Investment Fraud Or Mismanagement

There are many ways a broker, accountant or financial adviser can mismanage your investment funds. Such actions include:

  • Continually moving your investments, holding funds or never allowing you the chance to access your money
  • Promising a minimum rate of return or “no-risk” investment
  • Making frequent trades to increase their own commissions
  • Investing in mutual funds, insurance contracts and annuities that are too risky or too expensive for your personal situation

Getting Experienced Legal Help

If you believe that you or someone you love has been a victim of investment fraud or broker negligence, reaching out to a lawyer who understands the legal and financial implications of investor claims as soon as possible is advised.

Nationwide Experience Handling Investment Fraud Cases

For 50 years, our attorneys at Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, have built a reputation within the Columbus, Ohio, community for providing trusted legal representation.

Tim Van Eman has experience protecting the rights of investors in Columbus, Ohio, and surrounding areas. He often assists other attorneys in Ohio, Michigan and other states who are not adept at this area of law.

Call Us To Discuss Your Case

You put a lot of faith in the people handling your finances. When those investing your money take advantage of you, you have recourse.

We invite you to contact our firm to discuss your situation in greater detail. Call 614-360-2706 or send an email today. Tim offers free consultations and most cases are handled on a contingency basis.

Do not delay. There are time limits in which to file these cases and obtain damages.
